scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n renderer,electron,test -c cyan,green,magenta "vite --config vite.electron.renderer.config.ts" "npm run dev:electron" "vitest --watch --reporter=default --reporter=./scripts/vitest-notify-reporter.mjs"
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -k -n build,electron -c yellow,blue "npm run build:desktop:watch" "wait-on .vite/build/main.js .vite/build/preload.cjs .vite/build/server.js && MAIN_WINDOW_VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 electron ."
scripts.build:desktop: vite build --config vite.server.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.main.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.preload.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.renderer.config.ts
scripts.build:desktop:watch: concurrently -k -n server,main,preload -c cyan,green,magenta "vite build --watch --config vite.server.config.ts" "vite build --watch --config vite.electron.main.config.ts" "vite build --watch --config vite.electron.preload.config.ts"
scripts.desktop:make:mac: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-builder --mac
scripts.desktop:make:win: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-builder --win
scripts.desktop:make:linux: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-builder --linux
scripts.test:fast: npm run openapi:types && tsc --noEmit && vitest run
scripts.test: npm run openapi:types && npm run icons:build && tsc --noEmit && biome check . && npm run icons:check && swagger-cli validate docs/requirements/GOOSE_SERVER_OPENAPI.json && vitest run && knip && dpdm --exit-code circular:1 --warning false --tree false "./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" && jscpd --pattern "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" --min-tokens 100 --threshold 3 --reporters console --absolute && npm run audit:prod && npm run build:desktop && sh -c 'if [ -z "${DISPLAY}${WAYLAND_DISPLAY}" ] && command -v xvfb-run >/dev/null 2>&1; then xvfb-run -a playwright test; else playwright test; fi'
